page_content: The page appears to be a login portal for various services offered by Kanton Basel-Landschaft. It does not focus on software or provide guides about software.
The page provides various downloadable documents related to signalization and traffic light systems, but does not focus on software or provide guides about software.
The page focuses on the topic of Neobiota, invasive plants and animals, and their impact on the environment. It does not pertain to software or provide guides about software.
The page focuses on the importance of digital competencies in education, offering various downloadable materials for self-study and teaching.
The page offers various teaching materials and plans for digital education, focusing on media and informatics for primary schools.
The page provides an array of teaching ideas and resources for digital education, including topics on data protection and safe internet usage.
The page provides downloadable documents for conducting a CODE workshop, including planning, tasks, and evaluations related to programming and robotics.
